wikipedia_page.main: Ernest Walter Ebbage (1 August 1873 – 2 September 1943) was a British tug of war competitor who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics. In 1908 he won the bronze medal as member of the British team Metropolitan Police "K" Division.
